formalpara.title: Figure 4. Photographs of adult hermaphrodites of Caenorhabditis elegans (top) and Oscheius tipulae (bottom).
formalpara.para: Note the light brown color of the intestinal cell contents of Caenorhabditis compared to the darker color of the intestine of many other soil nematodes, including the common Oscheius tipulae. In addition, the few large intestinal cell nuclei of C. elegans are readily visible: compare them to the smaller nuclei of Oscheius tipulae. Notice also the smaller size of O. tipulae. Bar: 100 μm.
